0101100110111101 0100011111011101 0 -> sum: 1010000110011010, cout: 0
0111111001110011 0111111100010110 1 -> sum: 1111110110001010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
